about_the_game:
This soundtrack features 26 soundtracks from the Visual Novel Caffeine: Victoria's Legacy, including the Opening Theme Song "Caffeinated" sung by Jordan Fox, and the Closing Theme Song "Here And Now" sung by Diana Garnet.

WARNING Due to copyright issues, not all of the tracks used in Caffeine: Victoria's Legacy are included within this OST. Please reference the tracks list to verify which tracks are included within this product.
detailed_description:
This soundtrack features 26 soundtracks from the Visual Novel Caffeine: Victoria's Legacy, including the Opening Theme Song "Caffeinated" sung by Jordan Fox, and the Closing Theme Song "Here And Now" sung by Diana Garnet.

WARNING Due to copyright issues, not all of the tracks used in Caffeine: Victoria's Legacy are included within this OST. Please reference the tracks list to verify which tracks are included within this product.
name: Caffeine: Victoria's Legacy OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1400 MB available space
